document_data.mainbody:
Jebidian was an old scholar from the City of Splendors, Waterdeep, established and respected by the late 14 century DR.
Jebidian was a scholar from the same Waterdhavian academy as the aged Savant Gumbril. The Savant sought to impress his colleagues and especially Jebidian by uncovering a lost Netherese god from a ruined crypt on the Crabs Claw Coast. Instead Gumbril stumbled upon a prison of an immensely powerful ancient lich.
